column1: # This file ignores documented acceptable alerts to reduce noise in scan results

column3: # Base64 Disclosure - No sensitive data in bundles
# Suspicious Comments - Open source context, production builds minimize
# Modern Web Application - Dependency management in place
# Retrieved from Cache - Intentional caching configuration
# Sec-Fetch-Dest Header Not Set - Browser feature
# Sec-Fetch-Site Header Not Set - Browser feature
# Sec-Fetch-User Header Not Set - Browser feature

column1: # Low-Risk Alerts - Documented as Acceptable or Resolved

column3: # Cookie SameSite=None - AWS Cognito managed, documented
# Spectre Site Isolation - Headers verified working (false positive)
# Proxy Disclosure - Partially resolved (Server header low risk)
# Cookie Slack Detector - OAuth cookies, authentication enforced
# Session Management Response - Informational only, not a vulnerability
